description:
http://anidb.net/ch82464 [Urara], http://anidb.net/ch82465 [Hanabi], and http://anidb.net/ch82463 [Inaho] aim to become famous throughout Japan by creating anime renditions of themselves. To be a hit with everyone from kids to adults, they choose the theme of "magical girls". Now they aim to broadcast their one-cour (quarter of a year) magical girl anime.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
It`s a bold new experiment in technology as three girls are tasked with making their own anime!  This 3 minute short version of a longer, 40-minute program uses 3D computer technology to turn aspiring actress into anime magical girls!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sore wa Fushigi na Deai Nari?
それは不思議な出会いなり?

REGULAR.description:
The girls mission to become famous magical girl anime characters continues.  This time they`re under attack from an old friend: pkpk from Gdgd fairies!  Will they be able to come up with a clever scene and win big ratings?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Watashitachi wa Densetsu no Senshi Nari?
私たちは伝説の戦士なり?

REGULAR.description:
The girls come up with a new plot twist: to charge their Naria powers, they`ll need to become idols!  But then their plans go awry when a monsters puts a spell on them with the magic mirror.  Urara becomes an evil CEO, and Inaho a sketchy fortune teller.  Will they be able to break the spell and win the hearts of the audience? And how are they going to explain all this plot in an 8 minute show?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Happiness Energy o Charge Suru Nari?
ハピネスエネルギーをチャージするなり?

REGULAR.description:
It`s the season of love as a new boy comes to the Naria girls school, and they`re all instantly attracted to him.  But their love falls apart when he turns into a monster and uses the magic mirror to cast a spell.  This time the girls are transformed them into a boyfriend who loves huge breasts, asking his girlfriend`s strange father for her hand i marriage!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tenkousei wa Amakute Kiken na Koi no Wana Nari?
The Transfer Student Is a Sweet Trap of Love?
転校生は甘くて危険な恋の罠なり?

REGULAR.description:
The next step for the Naria girls on their road to idol stardom is to do a TV commercial!  But a cunning monster traps them in a hallucination!  The monster makes them think that they`re a traveling conman trying to pass a married woman off as a high-tech maid robot, and a pure boy who`s suspicious, but still can`t refuse because he can`t stop thinking about the maid`s breasts. To get out, they`ll have to pretend to be a store employee trying to sell a cucumber, and cast magic spells to get the hair out of a drain!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: めざせ! CMデビューなり?

REGULAR.description:
Urara wants to visit her grandma, so she uses her magic powers to fly to the countryside.  When she arrives, she finds out that grannie is really sick!  Then a monster appears, and tells her that she`s walked right into a trap! Can the Naria girls successfully play the roles of a boy on a first date, his weird girlfriend, and the ghost of his grandmother who appears and starts giving him nosy advice?  It may be the only way to save Urara`s own grandmother!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さよならおばあちゃん

REGULAR.description:
The girls take a vacation at Inaho`s villa, only to be attacked by a monster maid!   The monster puts them in a delicate situation, where one girls comes to their villa only to find a squatter living there already, and then somebody else comes to do an open house.  An epic villa-pun battle breaks out to determine who will win the villa.  Can they transform while sharing their bitter summer memories and defeat this villa villain?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsuyasumi wa Inaho no Bessou de Vacance Nari?
Take a Summer Vacation at Inaho`s Villa?
夏休みはいなほの別荘でバカンスなり?

REGULAR.description:
The girls meet a new magical girl, Usagi!  But when the new girl turns out to be a monster, they`ll have to become "a magical girl who`s anxious to fight the enemy that`s right in front of them, and a magical girl who`s started to get worried about things at the worst possible time, and a perverted magical girl who`s getting excited to realize that he`s actually a boy!"  Can they break out of the spell and transform by giving a plausible explanation for what they`d do with 150 crabs?
Source: crunchyroll

Urara is in the doldrums.  What is a monster? Why is she fighting them?  She meets another reluctant monster who shares her concerns, but then when her friends show up they have to fight!  The monsters attack turns them into a manager who catches a girl shoplifting at the supermarket when her father comes to apologize, but he`s actually the manager`s ex-boyfriend and things get super-awkward.  Then they almost run out of air time! Can Urara transform without using a catchphrase to speed things up?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: うららはひとりぼっちなり?

REGULAR.description:
The Naria girls have a new friend: a producer who wants to help them make their performance at the Nippon dome a big success.  She wants them to come up with new ideas for a concert, and then they`ll all have to sing their hit holiday songs: "Don`t touch my azukisoba", "Roll Roll Rollypolly", and "Stop Illegal Parking!"
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fully Charge Your Energy on the Stage of Dreams?
Yume no Butai de Energy o Full Charge Nari?
夢の舞台でエネルギーをフルチャージなり?

REGULAR.description:
Urara finds out the truth about her mom: that she wasn`t abandoned, her mother made a great wish to the Naria to save her life.  In a last-ditch attempt to stop her, the enemy Russian Winter turns her and her friends into a ditzy motorcycle gang readying for a battle against an enemy group.  Can they escape and defeat this final foe?
Source: crunchyroll

It`s the last episode, and like that OTHER magical girl anime, that means it`s time for a downer ending!  But first, the gang needs to come up with clever ways to get past a horde of enemies!  Can they stop talking about Urara`s recent purchase of leopard-print bras long enough to think of a way to get past their foes?  And how, exactly, is Urara like a Christmas card?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 魔法少女のいない世界

WIKIPEDIA_JP: 魔法少女%3Fなりあ☆がーるず

titles.title: 魔法少女? なりあ☆がーるず
